title: How to Get the Kinetic Glove in Slap Battles: 3 Easy Steps

steps.title: Equip the Stun glove.
steps.content: Equip the Stun glove. You can find this glove in the lobby; it looks blue with yellow lightning around it. You need the Stun glove's ability for one part of the badge's requirements.

steps.title: Enter the Normal Arena.
steps.content: Enter the Normal Arena. This is the red arena, on the left. You can't obtain the Kinetically Charged badge and Kinetic Glove on a private server.

steps.title: Without dying, use the Stun ability 50 times and get slapped 100 times.
steps.content: Without dying, use the Stun ability 50 times and get slapped 100 times. If you fall off the edge of the map, the count will reset, and you must start over. Tip : Ask a friend to bring the Moai glove and let yourself get ragdolled by its ability. This counts as a slap. [1] X Research source Don't forget to use the Stun ability to count towards your progress. When you get the notification for obtaining the Kinetically Charged badge, you'll find the Kinetic Glove in the lobby.

steps.title: The Kinetic Gloves gains power with each slap.
steps.content: The Kinetic Gloves gains power with each slap. As a player gets slapped or ragdolled, they'll build kinetic energy. The more attacks they receive, the more energy they absorb. Using the skill will release a Percussive Blast that takes the absorbed energy and launches it back. When Percussive Blast is used, the absorbed energy will reset and rebuild with new slaps.
